      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_cb7115f5e4bd66f3d9c0e7d40956b9b343cde169</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Enthalpy cycle of magnesium carbonate decomposition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpieschleife von 
Magnesiumkarbonataufspaltung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycle d'enthalpie de décomposition de carbonate 
de magnésium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo do enthalpy do decomposition do carbonato 
do magnésio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo di entalpia di decomposizione del carbonato
del magnesio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύκλος ενθαλπίας της αποσύνθεσης ανθρακικού άλατος 
μαγνήσιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo de la entalpia de la descomposición del 
carbonato del magnesio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the enthalpy cycle of  decomposition for magnesium carbonate.  This can be used as an exercise in determining the enthalpy change of the reaction.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hess's law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enthalpy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat of formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermodynamics</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Enthalpieschleife von 
Aufspaltung für Magnesiumkarbonat. Dieses kann als Übung 
verwendet werden, wenn man die Enthalpieänderung der Reaktion 
feststellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le cycle d'enthalpie de
la décomposition pour le carbonate de magnésium. Ceci peut 
être utilisé comme exercice en déterminant le changement 
d'enthalpie de la réaction.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o ciclo do enthalpy do 
decomposition para o carbonato do magnésio. Isto pode ser usado
como um exercício em determinar a mudança do enthalpy da reação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il ciclo di entalpia 
della decomposizione per il carbonato del magnesio. Ciò può 
essere usata come esercitazione nella determinazione del cambiamento 
di entalpia della reazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κύκλο ενθαλπίας της 
αποσύνθεσης για το ανθρακικό άλας μαγνήσιου. Αυτό μπορεί 
να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση στον καθορισμό της αλλαγής ενθαλπίας 
της αντίδρασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el ciclo de la entalpia
de la descomposición para el carbonato del magnesio. Esto se 
puede utilizar como ejercicio en la determinación del cambio de la 
entalpia de la reacción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz der hesss</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Enthalpie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze der Anordnung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thermodynamik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la loi des hess</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enthalpie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur de la formation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">thermodynamique</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
